name: One-Handed (nandbolt)
description:
(Rerelease)

Play as a hand that can shoot projectiles from its palm. Charge your projectiles to make them more potent, buy items at the shop, and defeat 10 waves of enemies to complete the game.

Keyboard + Mouse & Controller Support! (If controller is connected, keyboard + mouse inputs get ignored, so if you want to use keyboard + mouse, unplug your controller. Sorry for the inconvenience!)

* This is the first complete game I made with GameMaker, also not made for any jam. I'm rereleasing it because I think its kinda fun, and I did put alot of time into it. I made some slight quality-of-life changes from the original, but almost everything is identical. I may add more content to it, or remake it into a better version later since I've learned so much since then, but no promises. I also used a different alias when I first released it, and I don't plan on taking it down anymore.
